Create the widget

AllItems = {'Alpha';'Bravo';'Charlie';'Delta';'Echo';'Foxtrot'};
fig = figure;
w = uiw.widget.ListSelector(...
'Parent',fig,...
'AllItems',AllItems,...
'AddedIndexR',[2 4 5 6]);

Create the widget with ordering and search capability

AllItems = {'Alpha';'Bravo';'Charlie';'Delta';'Echo';'Foxtrot'};
fig = figure;
w = uiw.widget.ListSelector(...
'Parent',fig,...
'AllItems',AllItems,...
'AllowMove', true, ... %Callback is optional
'AllowSearch',true);

Create the widget with additional button options

Some of these buttons require custom callbacks to be written
AllItems = {'Alpha';'Bravo';'Charlie';'Delta';'Echo';'Foxtrot'};
fig = figure;
w = uiw.widget.ListSelector(...
'Parent',fig,...
'AllItems',AllItems,...
'AllowCopy', true, ... %Requires callback implementation
'AllowEdit', true, ... %Requires callback implementation
'AllowMove', true, ... %Callback is optional
'AllowPlot', true, ... %Requires callback implementation
'AllowReverse', true, ... %Requires callback implementation
'AllowRun', true, ... %Requires callback implementation
'AllowSearch',true);

Create the widget as a dialog

AllItems = {'Alpha';'Bravo';'Charlie';'Delta';'Echo';'Foxtrot'};
dlg = uiw.dialog.ListSelector(...
'AllItems',AllItems,...
'AllowMove', true, ... %Callback is optional
'AllowSearch',true);
% Wait for output like this:
% result = dlg.waitForOutput()
